context.description:
*7 minutes in heaven* is a multiplayer website that lets only two people be together at once, for seven minutes at a time.

![enter-heaven](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/5mhoDzFks1jN2On7ACksgL/5d2c9d9ac87cba6d35e9dc23fa72d4ce/Screenshot_-_Enter_Heaven.png)

  <video autoplay loop muted>
  <source   src="https://videos.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/4fepBWWeHhNo1c7IwFh2kZ/d276b5cbdf0ef2ded16dcc11f936c248/7_minutes_1080p.mov" />
</video>

This work was part of People of the Labyrinth: LEISURE CENTRE at [Public Works Administration](https://www.publicworksadministration.com/) in May/June 2024. The piece was displayed as an installation of two computers connected to same website placed on either end of the gallery, creating a heavenly portal to be with other visitors in the gallery.

![PWA Leisure Centre-28](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/4QNVlUVXlDECZLUwHdH5JE/22b7ab5e489d06d60d41db550eecbec5/PWA_Leisure_Centre-28.jpg)
![PWA Leisure Centre-10](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/4M0i81shKLyiMtWL91oTJ0/4bd3c48fe6fe064594ad347dd3808cd6/PWA_Leisure_Centre-10.jpg)
![PWA Leisure Centre-11](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/47ONzT2ymUI3DLC0tGcDn2/2eb5529f7daf7f4255dcd8d5613bfaad/PWA_Leisure_Centre-11.jpg)
![PWA Leisure Centre-14](//images.ctfassets.net/t9p4c9x03bar/5vjvXSwtY2UvOYCHOQDRCI/f5285ea52e7f0af74efac00088e8fe5d/PWA_Leisure_Centre-14.jpg)

<small>Photography by Courtney Kinnare</small>
context.shortDescription: A website for two people to be together at once.
context.title: 7 minutes in heaven
